name: PeacefulWhiteNoiseforSleep
0:
”Alexa open peaceful white noise”
”Alexa ask peaceful white noise to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peaceful white noise
des: Peaceful White Noise is a proven and effective way to block out distractions and fall asleep easy. White Noise is the ultimate science-backed companion for relaxation, focus, and better sleep. \n\nAll you need to do is say Alexa start Peaceful White Noise, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
